name: City Death Kill 2
description:
CITY DEATH KILL 2

After defeating the rival gang with Jed, you decided to go low for a while in order to turn down the heat. You thought it was over, all those spins, skate tricks and stylish shots, your days of being a stylish hitman were done for good.... UNTIL, Jed decides that things are way too boring, so he gives you another job to kill another gang on 3 different blocks. You accept, because you realized that the civilian life just wasn't for you...Time to get back into the style.

Controls:

MOUSE - Aim
LEFT CLICK - Shoot/Punch
WASD - Movement
SPACE - Dodge
Q E - Swap weapons
RIGHT CLICK - Throw weapon
F - Pickup Weapons and Ride skateboards
SHIFT - Slow down time

+ - Increase screen scale

F1 - Toggle Fullscreen
